column6: 160克熟土豆 300克低筋面粉 2克盐 2克小苏打 80克玉米油\橄榄油
column8: Ingredients: 6 tablespoons vegetable shortening 6 tablespoons margarine 1 cup SPLENDA Granular 1 large egg 1/4 cup molasses 2 cups sifted all-purpose flour 3/4 teaspoon ground ginger 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon 1/2 teaspoon ground cloves Directions: Mix together shortening, margarine, Splenda(R) Granular, egg and molasses. Sift together and stir in dry ingredients. Mix thoroughly. Chill dough in refrigerator until firm, about two hours. Form into 16 balls. Place on cookie sheet and pat down gently with fork. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes at 350-degrees. Do not over-bake. C Yield: 16 cookies. Nutritional information per cookie: Calories: 160 Total Fat: 10g Saturated Fat: 2g Carbohydrates: 16g Cholesterol: 15mg Protein: 2g Sodium: 260g Fiber: 1g Diabetic Exchanges: 1 Carbohydrate, 2 Fat
